text: Todd Christopher Young (born August 24, 1972) is an American politician. He is the senior U.S. Senator from Indiana. He previously served as a U.S. Representative for from 2011 to 2017. He is a member of the Republican Party. On November 8, 2016, Young was elected to the United States Senate in the general election. Young defeated Evan Bayh. ==References== ==Other websites== * Todd Young for Senate * * * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Military people from Pennsylvania Category:United States representatives from Indiana Category:United States senators from Indiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:University of Chicago alumni Category:United States Marine Corps personnel
title: Todd Young
